rainfalls: As of today, there is no Heavy Rainfall Warning Issued.
thunderstorms:
Thunderstorm Advisory No. 3 #NCR_PRSD

Issued at: 4:23 PM, 08 June 2025(Sunday)



Moderate to heavy rainshowers with lightning and strong winds are expected over Nueva Ecija, Bataan, Bulacan, Metro Manila, Cavite and Pampanga within the next 2 hours.



The above conditions are being experienced in Zambales(Castillejos, San Marcelino, San Antonio, San Narciso, San Felipe, Cabangan, Botolan, Masinloc, Palauig), Tarlac(San Jose, Capas), Rizal(Cardona, Binangonan, Jala-Jala, Pililla, Tanay), Laguna(Santa Maria, Mabitac, Pakil) and Quezon(General Nakar, Tagkawayan) which may persist within 2 hours and may affect nearby areas.



All are advised to take precautionary measures against the impacts associated with these hazards which include flash floods and landslides.



Keep monitoring for updates.
